mst_mission2.Name: Training Trip
mst_mission2.Details: Sail around the Naval District with 2 or more \nships, and raise the proficiency of \nthe fleet members!

mst_mission2.Name: Security Mission
mst_mission2.Details: Organize a fleet of 3 or more ships, and \npatrol around the Naval District!

mst_mission2.Name: Maritime Escort Mission
mst_mission2.Details: Send a fleet with a CL as the flagship and 2 \nor more DDs to keep the route of \nthe transport fleet safe!

mst_mission2.Name: Anti-aircraft Drill
mst_mission2.Details: Prepare for incoming hostile aircraft, undergo \na training exercise about AA fire and evasive \nmaneuvers with a fleet of 4 or more!

mst_mission2.Name: Fleet Review Rehearsal
mst_mission2.Details: Prepare for the fleet review, \nand send a fleet to its rehearsal!

mst_mission2.Name: Fleet Review
mst_mission2.Details:
Now is the time to show the result 
of our training efforts every day! 
Hold a fleet review with a fleet that 
includes at least one CV!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Mission for the \nPrelude
mst_mission2.Details: Send the Support Fleet and cover \nthe advance of the main fleet!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Mission for the \nDecisive Fleet Battle
mst_mission2.Details: Send another fleet and support the \nmain fleet at the entrance of \nthe decisive fleet battle!

mst_mission2.Name: Anti-sub Patrol Mission
mst_mission2.Details: Send a powerful torpedo division with a \nCL as the flagship, and patrol around \nthe South Connecting Sea for enemy submarines!

mst_mission2.Name: Oil Tanker Fleet Escort \nMission
mst_mission2.Details: Send a oil tanker fleet of numerous \ntransport ships and an escort fleet to \nthe southern oilfield area!

mst_mission2.Name: Bauxite Transport Mission
mst_mission2.Details: Escort the transport fleet carrying \nbauxite from the southern supply depot to the homeport!

mst_mission2.Name: Resource Transportation \nFleet Escort
mst_mission2.Details:
Send a transportation fleet of multiple 
transport ships and an escort fleet to 
resource production areas and 
transport the resources!

mst_mission2.Name: Light Aircraft Carrier \nMaritime Escort Mission
mst_mission2.Details: Send a fleet with a strong CVL \nand support the maritime escort \nforce of the South Connecing Sea!

mst_mission2.Name: Decoy Mobile Fleet Support \nOperation
mst_mission2.Details: Send a decoy force with a CV \nand lure the enemy mobile fleet away, \ntherefore supporting the main fleet!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Mission for the \nPrelude
mst_mission2.Details: Send the Support Fleet and cover the advance \nof the main fleet!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Mission for the \nDecisive Fleet Battle
mst_mission2.Details: Send another fleet and support the \nmain fleet at the entrance of the \ndecisive fleet battle!

mst_mission2.Name: Patrol Mission on the North
mst_mission2.Details:
Send a northern fleet with its core 
a torpedo division under the command of a 
CL as the flagship, and patrol 
around the Northern Anchorage!

mst_mission2.Name: Northern Fishing Area \nSecurity Mission
mst_mission2.Details: Send a fleet to the Northern Fishing Area, \nand provide security support for \nfishing boats in the area!

mst_mission2.Name: The Northern Drill
mst_mission2.Details: Send a fleet with numerous highly \nproficient BBV as its core force, \nand carry out an all-round drill!

mst_mission2.Name: Maritime Escort on Northern \nRoute
mst_mission2.Details: Send an elite northern escort fleet led \nby a CL with high proficiency and \ncarry out maritime escort on the northern route!

mst_mission2.Name: Northern Submarine Patrol \nMission
mst_mission2.Details: Send a fleet of SSs and their \nsupport ship to patrol around the front \narea of the Northern Area!!

mst_mission2.Name: Northern Area Force Recon \nOperaion
mst_mission2.Details: Sortie with an elite northern fleet led by \na highly proficient CA and \ncarry out force recon on the area!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Mission for the \nPrelude
mst_mission2.Details: Send the Support Fleet and cover \nthe advance of the main fleet!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Mission for the \nDecisive Fleet Battle
mst_mission2.Details: Send another fleet and support the \nmain fleet at the entrance of the \ndecisive fleet battle!

mst_mission2.Name: Southern Anchorage Security
mst_mission2.Details: Deploy ships like DDs around \nthe Southern Anchorage and \nensure its safety!

mst_mission2.Name: Southern Anchorage Area \nAnti-sub Patrol
mst_mission2.Details: Organize an elite torpedo division and \nenforce anti-sub patrol around the \nSouthern Anchorage Area!

mst_mission2.Name: Long-distance Training Trip
mst_mission2.Details: Execute long-distance training from the \nSouthern Anchorage Area, and raise the \nproficiency of the fleet!

mst_mission2.Name: Southern Aircraft Transport \nOperation
mst_mission2.Details: Reinforce air power to the south with \nCVs, AVs and \nmultiple Transport Ships!

mst_mission2.Name: Southern Tokyo Express
mst_mission2.Details:
Send a torpedo division carrying Drum Canisters 
(transport use) with a DD as the flagship 
to resupply friendly forces with 
food!

mst_mission2.Name: Southern Anchorage Area \nCombat Patrol
mst_mission2.Details: Intercept enemy fleet near the Southern Anchorage Area \nwith a Cruiser fleet led by a \nhighly proficient CA!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Mission for the \nPrelude
mst_mission2.Details: Send the Support Fleet and cover the \nadvance of the main fleet!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Mission for the \nDecisive Fleet Battle
mst_mission2.Details: Send another fleet and support the main \nfleet at the entrance of the \ndecisive fleet battle!

mst_mission2.Name: Central Western Sea Recon \nMission
mst_mission2.Details:
Deploy a fleet with a CL as the 
flagship, along with some seaplane-carrying 
ships, and carry out a recon run around the 
Central Western Sea!

mst_mission2.Name: Central Western Islands \nTokyo Express
mst_mission2.Details: Concentrate fast DDs in one fleet \nand transport supplies to the islands of \nfierce combat!

mst_mission2.Name: Surrounded Marines \nRecover Operation
mst_mission2.Details: Rally up the highly proficent and \nmaneuverable smaller ships and recover \nthe troops under siege!

mst_mission2.Name: Submarine Patrol of \nCentral Western Sea
mst_mission2.Details: Patrol around the Central Western Sea \nwith a fleet with 2 or more SSs!

mst_mission2.Name: Force Transport Operation
mst_mission2.Details: Sortie a force transport fleet with \nmultiple highly proficient BBV \nand some transport ships!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Operation for the \nDecisive Fleet Battle
mst_mission2.Details: Organize a strong side fleet, flank the enemy, \nand support the main force on the \ndecisive fleet battle!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Mission for the \nPrelude
mst_mission2.Details: Send the Support Fleet and cover \nthe advance of the main fleet!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Mission for the \nDecisive Fleet Battle
mst_mission2.Details: Send another fleet and support the \nmain fleet at the entrance of \nthe decisive fleet battle!

mst_mission2.Name: Southern Sea Recon \nMission
mst_mission2.Details: Deploy a strong fleet with a CL \nas the flagship in the Southern Sea, \nand run a recon there!

mst_mission2.Name: Construction of Seaplane Base
mst_mission2.Details: Deploy a fleet with 2 AVs \nand construct a seaplane base for \nscout planes in the Southern Sea!

mst_mission2.Name: Attack on Enemy Anchorage
mst_mission2.Details:
Attack the enemy Anchorage with a 
CA-centered fleet and eliminate 
the enemy transport fleet while 
it's still gathering!

mst_mission2.Name: Operation MO
mst_mission2.Details: Execute operation MO with a MO invasion \nforce consisting 2 CVs \nand multiple transport ships!

mst_mission2.Name: Tokyo Express
mst_mission2.Details: Load a torpedo division with Drum Canisters \n(Transport Use) and initialte Tokyo express \nto friendly troops to the south!

mst_mission2.Name: Tokyo Express (II)
mst_mission2.Details: Load a destroyer division with as many \nDrum Canisters (Transport Use) as possible, \nand continue southern Tokyo express!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Mission for the \nPrelude
mst_mission2.Details: Send the Support Fleet and cover \nthe advance of the main fleet!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Mission for the \nDecisive Fleet Battle
mst_mission2.Details: Send another fleet and support the \nmain fleet at the entrance of the decisive \nfleet battle!

mst_mission2.Name: Southwestern Islands Recon \nMission
mst_mission2.Details: Deploy a strong fleet with a \nCL as the flagship in the \nSouthwestern Islands, and run a recon there!

mst_mission2.Name: Seach and Destroy the Enemy \nSurface Force
mst_mission2.Details:
Sortie with a strong surface fleet with 
CAs as the main force, then 
search and destroy the enemy 
surface force!

mst_mission2.Name: Oil Tanker Fleet Escort Mission
mst_mission2.Details:
Send a tanker fleet with CVL, DDs 
and multiple transport ships to 
the Southwestern Island 
route!

mst_mission2.Name: Operation Hoku-Gou
mst_mission2.Details:
Organize a force transport fleet with 
combatant ships and BBVs as its core, 
and engage in transport 
of resources!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Mission for the \nPrelude
mst_mission2.Details: Send the Support Fleet to the Southwestern \nIslands and cover the advance of \nthe main fleet!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Mission for the \nDecisive Fleet Battle
mst_mission2.Details: Send another fleet to the Southwestern Islands \nand support the main fleet at the \nentrance of the decisive fleet battle!

mst_mission2.Name: Southwestern Sea Security \nMission
mst_mission2.Details: Deploy a fleet based on an torpedo division \nand ensure the security of the \nSouthwestern Sea!

mst_mission2.Name: Surface Commerce Raiding \nOperation
mst_mission2.Details: Cut off the enemy supply line with \na fleet backboned by fast, \nwell-armed CAs!!

mst_mission2.Name: Submarine Voyage Drill
mst_mission2.Details: Organize a submarine fleet with 3 \nor more SSs and execute long-range \nvoyage drill!

mst_mission2.Name: Submarine Voyage
mst_mission2.Details: Organize a submarine fleet with \n4 or more SSs and try to contact \nfriendly forces from afar!

mst_mission2.Name: Large-scale Transport Fleet
mst_mission2.Details: Transport resources to homeland with \na large transport fleet consisting 5 or \nmore transport ships and escorting DDs!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Mission for the \nPrelude
mst_mission2.Details: Send the Support Fleet to the \nSouthwestern Sea and cover the \nadvance of the main fleet!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Mission for the \nDecisive Fleet Battle
mst_mission2.Details: Send another fleet to the Southwestern Sea \nand support the main fleet at the \nentrance of the decisive fleet battle!

mst_mission2.Name: Submarine Commerce Raiding \nOperation
mst_mission2.Details: Send a submarine fleet of multiple \nSSs behind enemy lines and \ncommence commerce raiding!!

mst_mission2.Name: Airstrike Operation Against \nEnemy Homeport
mst_mission2.Details: Attack the enemy homeport at the \nWestern Sea with a strong mobile fleet \nincluding multiple Aircraft Carriers!

mst_mission2.Name: Contacting Foreign Ship
mst_mission2.Details: Organize and deploy a submarine fleet of \n4 or more SSs and intend \nto meet a foreign ship!

mst_mission2.Name: Blockade Operation for the \nWestern Sea
mst_mission2.Details: Put enemy ships in the Western Sea under \nblockade by a mixed fleet of multiple \nSubmarines and a surface fleet!!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Mission for the \nPrelude
mst_mission2.Details: Send the Support Fleet to the \nWestern Sea and cover the advance \nof the main fleet!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Mission for the \nDecisive Fleet Battle
mst_mission2.Details: Send another fleet to the Western Sea and \nsupport the main fleet at the entrance \nof the decisive fleet battle!

mst_mission2.Name: Northern Sea Security
mst_mission2.Details: Deploy a strong fleet based on an torpedo \ndivision and ensure the security \nof the Northern Sea!

mst_mission2.Name: Northern Sea Force Recon
mst_mission2.Details:
Deploy a surface fleet with a CA 
as the flagship to the Northern Sea 
and carry out force recon on 
the area!

mst_mission2.Name: Northern Feign Attack \nOperation
mst_mission2.Details:
Deploy a carrier mobile fleet with a 
CVL as the flagship to the Northern Sea 
and carry out a feign attack 
toward the enemy!

mst_mission2.Name: Northern Sea Aerial Strategic \nRecon
mst_mission2.Details: Deploy a powerful aerial recon fleet with \na AV as the flagship and carry out \nstrategic recon on the Northern/AL Area!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Mission for the \nPrelude
mst_mission2.Details: Send the Support Fleet to the Northern Sea \nand cover the advance of the main fleet!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Mission for the Decisive \nFleet Battle
mst_mission2.Details: Send another fleet to the Northern Sea and \nsupport the main fleet at the entrance \nof the decisive fleet battle!

mst_mission2.Name: Central Sea Recon Mission
mst_mission2.Details: Deploy an elite Torpedo Division to the \nCentral Sea and carry out recon on the area!

mst_mission2.Name: Seaplane Long-distance Recon \nMission
mst_mission2.Details: Execute long-distance recon with a strong \naerial recon fleet with multiple \nAVs!

mst_mission2.Name: Transporting Naval Aviation \nForce to the Front Line
mst_mission2.Details: Send a Carrier group with multiple CVs, \nescorted by a highly proficient Torpedo division, \nand transport replacement aircrafts to the front line!

mst_mission2.Name: Cross-oceanic Training Trip
mst_mission2.Details: Carry out cross-oceanic training trip with a \ntraining fleet led by a Training Cruiser \nand raise the proficiency of the fleet!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Mission for the \nPrelude
mst_mission2.Details: Send the Support Fleet to the Central Sea \nand cover the advance of the main fleet!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Mission for the \nDecisive Fleet Battle
mst_mission2.Details: Send another fleet to the Central Sea and \nsupport the main fleet at the entrance of \nthe decisive fleet battle!

mst_mission2.Name: Recon Mission on MI Area
mst_mission2.Details: Deploy a strong fleet with an elite CA \nfleet as its core, and carry out recon \nmission on MI Area!

mst_mission2.Name: Operation K
mst_mission2.Details: Send a fleet led by a highly proficient AV \nto MI Area, and carry out long-range \nstrategic recon!

mst_mission2.Name: Submarine Patrol on MI Area
mst_mission2.Details: Patrol around MI Area with a fleet of \nmultiple elite SSs!

mst_mission2.Name: Mobile Fleet Patrol Mission
mst_mission2.Details: Deploy a strong mobile fleet at MI Area \nand surpress enemy mobile fleet activities!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Mission for the \nPrelude
mst_mission2.Details: Send the Support Fleet to the MI Islands \nand cover the advance of the main fleet!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Mission for the \nDecisive Fleet Battle
mst_mission2.Details: Send another fleet to the MI Islands and support \nthe main fleet at the entrance of the \ndecisive fleet battle!

mst_mission2.Name: Recon Mission on AL Area
mst_mission2.Details: Deploy a mobile fleet with elite \nCVL as its core and attack the \nenemy at AL Area from the air!

mst_mission2.Name: Operation AL
mst_mission2.Details: Send a strong mobile fleet with a fleet \nof elite CVL as its \ncore and commence Operation AL!

mst_mission2.Name: Patrol Mission on AI Area
mst_mission2.Details: Deploy highly proficient SSs and \na Torpedo Division, and patrol around \nAL Area!

mst_mission2.Name: Attack on Enemy Northern Base
mst_mission2.Details: Send a fleet with a strong BBV \nfleet as its core and destroy the \nenemy base on the north!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Mission for the \nPrelude
mst_mission2.Details: Send the Support Fleet to the AL Islands \nand cover the advance of the main fleet!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Mission for the \nDecisive Fleet Battle
mst_mission2.Details: Send another fleet to the AL Islands and \nsupport the main fleet at the entrance \nof the decisive fleet battle!

mst_mission2.Name: Recon Mission on FS Area
mst_mission2.Details: Send a fleet with multiple highly proficient \nAVs as its core and \nrecon around FS Area!

mst_mission2.Name: Operation FS
mst_mission2.Details: Compose a strong mobile fleet with elite \ncarrier divisions and commence \nOperation FS with the fleet!

mst_mission2.Name: Cross-oceanic Submarine \nOperation
mst_mission2.Details: Disrupt enemy logistics effort around FS Area \nwith a submarine fleet of 3 or more \nSSs and support vessels!

mst_mission2.Name: South-East Asian Cross-oceanic \nTraining Trip
mst_mission2.Details: Commence South-East Asian training ship \nwith a training fleet led by a Training Cruiser, \nand further raise the fleet's proficiency!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Mission for the Prelude
mst_mission2.Details: Send the Support Fleet to the FS Islands \nand cover the advance of the main fleet!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Mission for the \nDecisive Fleet Battle
mst_mission2.Details: Send another fleet to the FS Islands \nand support the main fleet at the entrance \nof the decisive fleet battle!

mst_mission2.Name: Recon Mission on the Rear \nArea of the Deep Sea
mst_mission2.Details: Send a fleet with multiple elite CVs \nas its core, and recon around the \nRear Area of the Deep Sea!

mst_mission2.Name: Submarine Operation in \nEnemy Rear Area
mst_mission2.Details: Disrupt enemy logistics efforts in the \nRear Area of the Deep Sea with a submarine fleet of \n4 or more SSs and support vessels!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Mission for the \nPrelude
mst_mission2.Details: Send the Support Fleet to the Rear Area \nof the Deep Sea and cover the \nadvance of the main fleet!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Mission for the \nDecisive Fleet Battle
mst_mission2.Details: Send another fleet to the Rear Area \nof the Deep Sea and support the main fleet \nat the entrance of the decisive fleet battle!

mst_mission2.Name: Recon Mission on the Canal \nArea of the Deep Sea
mst_mission2.Details: Send a fleet with multiple AVs \nas its core and recon around the \nCanal Area of the Deep Sea!

mst_mission2.Name: Submarine Blockade Operation \non Enemy Canal
mst_mission2.Details: Commence blocade of the Canal Area of \nthe Deep Sea with a submarine fleet of 4 \nor more SSs and supportive vessels!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Mission for the \nPrelude
mst_mission2.Details: Send the Support Fleet to the Canal Area \nof the Deep Sea and cover the advance \nof the main fleet!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Mission for the \nDecisive Fleet Battle
mst_mission2.Details: Send another fleet to the Canal Area of the \nDeep Sea and support the main fleet at \nthe entrance of the decisive fleet battle!

mst_mission2.Name: Recon Mission on the Central \nArea of the Deep Sea
mst_mission2.Details: Send a fleet with multiple elite BBV \nas its core and recon around the \nCentral Area of the Deep Sea!

mst_mission2.Name: Force Recon Operation on the \nDeepest Enemy Territory
mst_mission2.Details: Carry out aerial recon on the Central Anchorage \nof the Deep Sea with a fleet based on \nelite CVs!

mst_mission2.Name: Submarine Blockade Operation \non Enemy Anchorage
mst_mission2.Details: Commence blockade on the Central Anchorage \nof the Deep Sea with a submarine fleet of \n4 or more SSs and support vessels!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Mission for the \nPrelude
mst_mission2.Details: Send the Support Fleet to the Central Area \nof the Deep Sea and cover the advance \nof the main fleet!

mst_mission2.Name: Support Mission for the \nDecisive Fleet Battle
mst_mission2.Details: Send another fleet to the Central Area of the \nDeep Sea and support the main fleet at the \nentrance of the decisive fleet battle!
